nl.tno.sensorstorm.impl

Class OperationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tno.sensorstorm.impl.OperationManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class OperationManager
extends Object
implements Serializable
    An OperationManager manages for a specific fieldGrouper the operation instance and optional batcher and optional one or more MetaParticleHandlers.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • OperationManager

        public OperationManager(String fieldGroupValue,
                Class<? extends Batcher> batcherClass,
                Class<? extends ParticleBatchOperation> batchOperationClass,
                Map stormNativeConfig,
                nl.tno.storm.configuration.api.ExternalStormConfiguration stormConfiguration)
                 throws InstantiationException,
                        IllegalAccessException
        Creates a new OperationManager for a specific fieldGrouper with a batcher and operation.
        Parameters:
        fieldGroupValue - The fieldGroupValue this operationManager works for. An operation will be created when a particle which matches the fieldGroupValue arrives for the first time. If the fieldGroupValue is null, only one instance of the operation will be created directly within this constructor.
        batcherClass - The class of the batcher to be used.
        batchOperationClass - The class of the batched operation to be used.
        stormNativeConfig - A reference to the storm config
        Throws:
        IllegalAccessException
        InstantiationException

      • OperationManager

        public OperationManager(String fieldGroupValue,
                Class<? extends SingleParticleOperation> operationClass,
                Map stormNativeConfig,
                nl.tno.storm.configuration.api.ExternalStormConfiguration stormConfiguration)
                 throws InstantiationException,
                        IllegalAccessException
        Creates a new OperationManager with a single operation.
        Parameters:
        fieldGroupValue - The fieldGroupValue this operationManager works for. An operation will be created when a particle which matches the fieldGroupValue arrives for the first time. If the fieldGroupValue is null, only one instance of the operation will be created directly within this constructor.
        batchOperationClass - The class of the single operation to be used.
        conf - A reference to the storm config
        Throws:
        IllegalAccessException
        InstantiationException

    • Method Detail

      • processDataParticle

        public List<Particle> processDataParticle(DataParticle dataParticle)
        Process a DataParticle.
        Parameters:
        dataParticle - DataParticle to be processed. If the particle == null, null is returned
        Returns:
        returns a list with zero or more DataParticles, these particles should be emitted by the bolt. Or null in case of an error, which will be logged

      • processMetaParticle

        public List<Particle> processMetaParticle(MetaParticle metaParticle)
        Process a MetaParticle.
        Parameters:
        metaParticle - Particle to be processed. If the particle == null, null is returned
        Returns:
        returns a list with one MetaParticle (to be sent further up to the topology), zero or more DataParticles or null in case of an error. These particles should be emitted by the bolt.

      • handleMetaParticle

        protected List<Particle> handleMetaParticle(MetaParticle metaParticle)
        pass this metaParticle to all metaHandlers.
        Parameters:
        metaParticle -

      • getOutputParticles

        public static List<Class<? extends Particle>> getOutputParticles(Class<? extends Operation> operationClass)
        Given an Operation class, figure out all the types of particles (both DataParticles and MetaParticles) produced by this Operation.
        Parameters:
        operationClass - Class of the Operation
        Returns:
        List of Particle classes
